p: The New Secretary.—As will be seen in our telegraphed lists of passengers, Mr. N. H. Owings, accompanied by his wife and child, is one of the passengers now on board the City of Panama on her way up the coast. He is the newly-appointed Secretary for the Territory, and will succeed Mr. H. G. Struve probably on or about next Tuesday. Mr. Owing's was the last of the appointments of President Grant in this Territory.
